external_games.name: Sentinels of the Multiverse - Wrath of the Cosmos

name: Sentinels of the Multiverse: Wrath of the Cosmos
summary: The Cosmos are leaving their mark on the Multiverse! Do you have what it takes to save the earth from the impending annihilation? Includes Captain Cosmic, Sky-Scraper, Deadline, Infinitor, Kaargra Warfang, Progeny, Dok’Thorath Capital, and The Enclave of the Endlings.
